title: A review of an oven on Currys. Not sure what Richard was expecting.
author: MonstroFab

comments.author: Miles_1995
comments.body: I only rate 5 stars to ovens with a Maxwell Demon installed at the door.

comments.author: paulcaar
comments.body:
New frying pan is terrible! It melts all my plastic utensils!

Don't buy, what a waste of money!!1!
